attributes.action: Request retailers take details of a person buying a PC or laptop to put on a register
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When you buy a tv, you have to give your details due to the tv licensing.  If you had to do the same when buying a PC or laptop these details could all be logged together and then help prevent or trace all manner of computer crimes etc as police would be able to trace the registered person from the individual computer's address.
